attributes.overallObjectives: Students will gain a comprehensive foundation in computer science principles, developing strong problem-solving abilities through hands-on programming exercises and theoretical concept exploration. This course combines practical coding skills with fundamental computing concepts, preparing students for advanced computer science courses and real-world software development challenges. Emphasis is placed on developing algorithmic thinking and software engineering best practices.
classObjectives: Week 1 | Programming Fundamentals: Master variables, data types, operators, and basic syntax through hands-on Python exercises
Week 2 | Control Structures: Build programs using conditional statements, loops, and flow control concepts
Week 3 | Functions & Modularity: Design reusable code components with proper scope, parameters, and return values
Week 4 | Data Structures: Implement arrays, lists, and basic algorithms for efficient data manipulation
Week 5 | Object-Oriented Programming: Create classes, objects, and inheritance hierarchies for game development
Week 6 | File Operations: Master file handling, I/O techniques, and error management strategies
Week 7 | Algorithm Design: Study sorting, searching, and optimization techniques with complexity analysis
Week 8 | Final Project: Develop a comprehensive application showcasing all learned concepts
